events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund and return the item as soon as possible.
The customer's case has been categorized under Refund due to their request for returning a product and receiving their money back.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m Emma and I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket hasn’t been worn outside and is still in the original packaging with tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thanks for making the return process easy. I look forward to the email with the return label.
The return label email has been sent. Please let us know once you ship the jacket so we can track your refund progress.
Hello again! We wanted to check if you have shipped the jacket back and to update you that we are standing by to process your refund as soon as the return arrives.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday via the prepaid label. Please let me know once the refund has been issued.
We have received your return and processed your refund this afternoon. The amount should reflect in your payment method shortly.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience. We appreciate your time and input.
Completed the survey and left positive feedback about how smoothly the refund and return process went.
This case is now closed as the refund has been completed and customer feedback received. Thank you for contacting support.
